item.title: Thoughts on A5e
item.author: blog@lordyod.com
item.dc:creator: Lord Yod
item.description: Level Up 5E advertises itself as ‘advanced 5th edition’ and I’ve had my eye on it for a while. While I haven’t run any playtests I have read the material they’ve released. I like a lot of the ideas that have have been introduced, such as increased martial class flexibility and an increased emphasis on the exploration pillar of play.
